channel.title: I have changed the coords of the emote dance.. now?
channel.description: i want it to say KBD on it, instead of dance, how do i change it, im using gangscape v5. please help

item.title: I have changed the coords of the emote dance.. now?

item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

Add that sendFrame code in the case.

item.title: I have changed the coords of the emote dance.. now?
item.dc:creator: @flargie flargie
item.description:
@flargie wrote:

umm… i did that… but it still says “dance” but when you click it it goes to the KBD place…

item.source: I have changed the coords of the emote dance.. now?

item.title: I have changed the coords of the emote dance.. now?
item.dc:creator: @Olbrantz Olbrantz
item.description:
@Olbrantz wrote:

Right click the specific emote button in-game and it should say Ok, ###. That number is the interface I.D. Search for any other custom emote text in your client.java and under it add sendFrame126("TEXTHERE", ###); Put the interface I.D. where the number symbols are.

Read full topic
item.source: I have changed the coords of the emote dance.. now?
